activate.title: Activate your account
activate.set_password: Please set a password to activate your account.
activate.success:
Your account has been activated.
You can now sign in.
activate.verification_error: Something went wrong, could not verify activation token.

errors.inactive_account: Account is inactive. Please contact the administrator.
errors.unknown_password_reset_token: Could not verify password reset token.

new_password_set.general:
Your new password has been set.

You can now use it to sign in.
new_password_set.security:
Your new password has been set.

For security purposes you have been signed out.

Please sign in with your new password.

password_reset_email_sent.title: E-mail sent
password_reset_email_sent.text: Instruction on how to reset your password have been sent to {email}.

register.text: If you wish to become a Promoter for Clubpromoters, register with us now!
register.title: Register to become a Promoter
register.registered:
You have registered an account with Clubpromoters.

An e-mail will be sent to "{email}" to activate your account.
